issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
After packaging an app for the AppStore and viewing it in the Xcode Organizer, I see it listed in the 'Other Items' section and not in the 'iOS Apps' section.

*Steps to reproduce issue*:
1. Package an app for the AppStore
2. Open Xcode
3. Go to the Organizer -> Archives window

*Actual Results*:
The app is listed under the 'Other Items' section

*Expected Results*
The app is listed under the 'iOS Apps' section

*Notes*
We are not sure what causes the app to appear in this section and information online about the issue is scarce.
fields.summary: Apps packaged for AppStore appear in Xcode's 'Other items' section
fields.environment:
Xcode 6.3
MacOS 10.10.3
Studio 4.0.0.201504221335
Ti SDK 4.0.0.Beta3
Appc NPM 0.3.46
Appc CLI 0.2.255
Ti CLI 4.0.0-beta7
Alloy 1.6.0-beta4
Node v0.10.37

Ti CLI 4.0.0-beta9
